From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

For a list of municipalities in Slovakia, see List of municipalities and towns in Slovakia.

This is a list of cities and towns in Slovakia, called mestá (singular mesto) in Slovak. Although mesto is variously translated into English as "town" or "city", there is no such legal distinction in Slovakia.

As of 25 September 2019[update], there were 141 cities (miest) in Slovakia.[1] For German and Hungarian names of these towns, which are used by the respective ethnic minorities, see list of German exonyms for places in Slovakia and list of Hungarian exonyms for places in Slovakia.
